creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: Mary on a throne holding baby Jesus who is standing on her PR leg; angel on either side of throne; Mary's PL hand rests on a book on knee; printed on sheet that is rounded at the top
marks:
Stamp

in graphite on verso: Passs 538 / A22 wit
provenance: Ivan Izaklevitch de Kouriss, sale in 1889; C.G. Boerner, Düsseldorf, inv. no. A22; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Virgin Enthroned
